desc.jp: Sensei leaves for an expedition into the desert around Millennium with Eimi to look into the strange phenomenon in the area. Although there are no huge issues, but the two soon become tired due to the oppressive heat. In their moment of need, Eimi pulls out her secret weapon.
desc.zh_cn: 为了调查{sn千年}近郊沙漠的异常现象，老师和{cf英美}一起去进行探索。虽然没有发生特别的问题，但炎热的气候让两人都渐渐疲惫了。此时，{cf英美}拿出了驱离暑气的秘密武器。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: ボーっとすること、音楽鑑賞

profile.en:
An agent of the Super Phenomenon Task Force at the Millennium School.

An emotionally inscrutable oddball, Eimi very rarely speaks and can often be found staring off into space for no particular reason. However, there's no one as brutally efficient as her when it comes to carrying out missions for Seminar.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、特異現象捜査部のメンバー。

口数が少ない、考えを読みづらい少女。特に理由もなくぼーっと立っていることも多い。しかしセミナーの依頼を受けて任務を遂行する時だけは、誰よりも効率的に動き、迅速に目標を達成させる。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，「特异现象调查部」的成员。

话少，难以理解想法的少女。
经常无缘由站着发呆。
但接受来自研讨会的委托执行任务时，她能比任何人都更高效地行动，迅速达成目标。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，特异现象搜查部的成员。

是很少开口说话，难以得知其想法的少女。经常无来由地呆呆站着。
但是只有在受研讨会委托运行任务时，会以比任何人都有效率的行动迅速达成目标。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
千禧年科技超自然现象调查部的要员。

她是一个仿佛生活在四次元空间的少女，很少有人能看透她的想法。不仅沉默寡言，而且经常毫无理由地站着发呆。
但是，执行研讨会委托的任务时，能比任何人都更有效率地行动并达成目标。

gacha.en: How can I fight more effectively?
gacha.jp: もう少し効率的に戦える方法はないのかな……？
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 有没有更高效的战斗方法呢……？
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 没有更有效率的战斗方法吗……？
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 怎样才可以更有效率地战斗呢……？

intro.en: What do I need to do? Teach me, Sensei.
intro.jp:
今から何をすればいい？
教えて、先生。
intro.zh_cn_jp:
今から何をすればいい？
教えて、先生。
intro.zh_cn_tw:
接下来要做什么？
告诉我吧，老师。

desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf莉音}笃定自己能获胜时，{cf阳葵}在{cf英美}的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了{cn贝里塔斯}支持的{cn游戏开发部}面临空前的危机，{cn贝里塔斯}的副部长{cf千寻}在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.jp: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}向{cf阳葵}讲述了自己计划的当前进度。{cf阳葵}对{cf莉音}计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意{cf莉音}的本来目的。{cf阳葵}表示{cf莉音}“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问{cf莉音}“是否有与{sn其他}人交谈过”。{cf莉音}正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.jp: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是{cf阳葵}社团里的后辈{cf英美}前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。{cf英美}承认这么做对{sn其他}人意义并不是很大，但{cf阳葵}则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was displaying something.
desc.jp: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was displaying something.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cn贝里塔斯}因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。

desc.en: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.jp: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人正在与前卫君交战，突然发现前卫君的动作变迟缓了很多。这时，{cn贝里塔斯}的{cf千寻}接入通讯。

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cf优香}和{cf乃爱}的协助下，{cn游戏开发部}成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当{cn工程师部}和{cn贝里塔斯}等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。{cf桃井}、{cf绿}、{cf柚子}、老师企图在{cf阳葵}的协助下唤醒{cf爱丽丝}，于是便进入了{cf爱丽丝}的精神世界。

desc.en: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}解释称，{cf优香}觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。{cf优香}呵斥了{cf莉音}，说明会严厉追究她的责任。{cn工程师部}此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和{cn工程师部}干扰。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.jp: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.zh_cn: 在Key以为仍有机会时，{cf阳葵}突然出现并解释{cnC&C}和{cf英美}已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。{cf莉音}惊讶于{cf阳葵}竟未逃走，而{cf阳葵}则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管{cf爱丽丝}的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将{cf爱丽丝}唤醒。至于如何唤醒，{cf阳葵}提出让{cn游戏开发部}和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回{cf爱丽丝}。{cf莉音}指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在{sn千年}几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，{cf阳葵}开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.zh_cn: 在{sn阿拜多斯}挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的{cn对策委员会}。听到{cf爱丽丝}的身体没有任何异常的消息后，{cn游戏开发部}觉得很开心。另一方面，{cf阳葵}确认隐藏足迹的{cf莉音}留下的情报。

desc.en: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.jp: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}沙漠，那里驻扎着的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大东西。他们立刻联系了PMC将军和联邦学生会的防卫室。

name.jp: カイザーPMCプレジデント

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.jp: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}向{cn对策委员会}众人报告了自己所看见的东西，指出这些天来PMC的军力移动相当奇怪。大家表示同意。{cf星野}提出不如大家偷偷溜进去看一眼，但被{cf绫音}提醒了之前的事情。这时有人提议询问老师的意见；虽然害怕打扰老师，{cf绫音}还是让老师有时间就来{sn阿拜多斯}一趟。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 愛麗絲剛剛接受了工程師部和貝裡塔斯的檢查，並被要求要定期來訪。貝裡塔斯沒有找到Kei的痕跡，不過愛麗絲表示，下一次見到Kei時，她會更加大力地把她打飛的。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲剛剛接受了工程師部和貝裡塔斯的檢查，並被要求要定期來訪。貝裡塔斯沒有找到Kei的痕跡，不過愛麗絲表示，下一次見到Kei時，她會更加大力地把她打飛的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}刚刚接受了{cn工程师部}和{cn贝里塔斯}的检查，并被要求要定期来访。{cn贝里塔斯}没有找到Kei的痕迹，不过{cf爱丽丝}表示，下一次见到Kei时，她会更加大力地把她打飞的。

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}觉得“宇宙勇者”这个主意非常棒，畅想自己登上宇宙战舰的那一天。据说{cn工程师部}正在不断钻研中。最后，{cf桃井}提出把游戏换成“太空歌剧”为背景的“弹幕射击游戏”，这让{cf绿}不是特别开心。

desc.en: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.jp: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.zh_cn: Kei一直在暗处看着{cf爱丽丝}。Kei理解{cf爱丽丝}想要摆脱自己“王女”的身份，但指出命运最终会让她成为那样。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.jp: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.zh_cn: 作为全{sn千年}最厉害的黑客，{cf阳葵}承担下了对{cf莉音}建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是{cf莉音}直接推卸了责任。{cf阳葵}访问了{cf莉音}存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。
desc.jp: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}突然来到{cf阳葵}身边，她追问“大姐大”究竟说了什么。{cf阳葵}表示具体内容还需要时间，但大概就是要为{sn其他}特异现象做好准备，同时基沃托斯要迎来危机之类的。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.jp: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}突然出现在两人面前，吓到了两人。{cf季}表示{cf莉音}只跟她说了“以后自由生活吧”云云，但她并不知道怎么做，于是就一直待着这里。{cf阳葵}询问{cf季}加入{cnC&C}的情况，{cf季}表示前辈们待她很好，但只是还有隔阂。最后{cf阳葵}决定，就此事先联系{et夏莱}请求帮助。

desc.en: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。
desc.jp: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。
desc.zh_cn: 学生们收到老师的联系后一一前往联邦学生会。为了解决眼前的状况，以{cf琳}为首收集情报与创建作战计划。为了拯救暴露在圣所的人，老师和{cf圣亚}开始寻找{cf葛叶}。听到消息后，仁耶表示搜索{cf葛叶}的任务交给自己。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.jp: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人在列车站遇见了虚弱的{cf白子}。{cf白子}与她们发生了战斗，随后倒地。{cf星野}询问{cf白子}来自哪里，{cf白子}回答不知道。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.zh_cn: 联邦学生会的{cf琳}由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托{et夏莱}发布召集命令。{cf琳}随后拜托{cf桃香}和{cf步}代她处理在这期间的事情。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.jp: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf佳世子}、{cf优香}、{cf亚子}、{cf花子}和{cf绫音}陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.jp: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.zh_cn: {cn阴阳部}表示，{cf葛业}并不在{sn百鬼夜行}的学生名册上，但提到有一个地方记载了相关内容：在{sn百鬼夜行}尚未成立时，{cf葛业}设立了“百花缭乱”以调停纷争。尽管目前仍有传言百花缭乱的委员长会直接听命于她，但由于百花缭乱的正副委员长已经长时间无法联络，因而百花缭乱即将被废部――在似乎无望之际，仁耶提出了一个方法。

desc.en: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.jp: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}对这两人居然因为分组而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在两人不肯让步的情况下，{cf优香}勒令两人用猜拳的方式决定，否则计划就要赶不上了。无奈，两人只好以此决胜。

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 第六個聖所的守護者還沒現身，本部決定要先加強D.U.白鳥區周圍地區的防禦。美食研究會自願參加防禦作戰…但後來發現凱坦澤在周圍活動。

desc.zh_cn: Kaitenger是一群自称为“正义的英雄”的学生，实际上常常闹出卵子。她们也是游戏中的主BOSS。

desc.en: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.jp: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.zh_cn: 由于有了{cf季}的支援，{cn特异现象搜查部}两人的工作得以减少一部分。不过{cf阳葵}警告{cf季}说，{cf季}的装甲的力量在很大程度上与{cf莉音}的要塞都市有关，而在都市被摧毁的情况下，建议{cf季}只把它当作普通装甲看待。

desc.en: D.U.白鳥區正在進行修復作業中，\n遊戲開發部一行人發現了名為<Kei>的存檔，並且交給了陽葵。香耶和曾背叛自己的凱薩將軍合作。
desc.jp: D.U.白鳥區正在進行修復作業中，\n遊戲開發部一行人發現了名為<Kei>的存檔，並且交給了陽葵。香耶和曾背叛自己的凱薩將軍合作。
desc.zh_cn: D.U.白鸟区正在进行修复作业中，\n{cn游戏开发部}一行人发现了名为<Kei>的存盘，并且交给了{cf阳葵}。{cf香耶}和曾背叛自己的凯萨将军合作。

desc.en: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，並提到其中的資金流向似乎並不是特別透明，直播隨後被中斷。
desc.jp: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，並提到其中的資金流向似乎並不是特別透明，直播隨後被中斷。
desc.zh_cn: 诗音向电视机前的观众介绍DU白鸟区的修复进程，并提到其中的资金流向似乎并不是特别透明，直播随后被中断。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，提到了在本次事件中各地區的傷亡人數都很低，可謂奇蹟。她隨後提及了關於聖所之塔的情況，指出大樓雖然被破壞，但實際上在會長消失後就並未使用。詩音還提及了關於夏萊的一個傳聞：老師最後在田野裡奔跑著、向學生招手。直播被立刻中斷。
desc.jp: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，提到了在本次事件中各地區的傷亡人數都很低，可謂奇蹟。她隨後提及了關於聖所之塔的情況，指出大樓雖然被破壞，但實際上在會長消失後就並未使用。詩音還提及了關於夏萊的一個傳聞：老師最後在田野裡奔跑著、向學生招手。直播被立刻中斷。
desc.zh_cn: 诗音向电视机前的观众介绍DU白鸟区的修复进程，提到了在本次事件中各地区的伤亡人数都很低，可谓奇迹。她随后提及了关于圣所之塔的情况，指出大楼虽然被破坏，但实际上在会长消失后就并未使用。诗音还提及了关于{et夏莱}的一个传闻：老师最后在田野里奔跑着、向学生招手。直播被立刻中断。

desc.en: 畫面轉到PMC的辦公室，聯邦學生會防衛室的部長香耶正在與PMC的將軍交談。兩人重申了一些共識，指出他們的合作仍然有效，希望之後能提供支援。
desc.jp: 畫面轉到PMC的辦公室，聯邦學生會防衛室的部長香耶正在與PMC的將軍交談。兩人重申了一些共識，指出他們的合作仍然有效，希望之後能提供支援。
desc.zh_cn: 画面转到PMC的办公室，联邦学生会防卫室的部长{cf香耶}正在与PMC的将军交谈。两人重申了一些共识，指出他们的合作仍然有效，希望之后能提供支持。

desc.en: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 花耶是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Kaiser PMC army's general, known as "General" for short as well. He commands both the usual PMC army and the PMC SOF (Special Operation Force).
desc.jp: Kaiser PMC army's general, known as "General" for short as well. He commands both the usual PMC army and the PMC SOF (Special Operation Force).
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒PMC军队的将军，简称为“将军”。他对常规的PMC军队和PMC特殊部队（SOF）均有控制权。

name.jp: カイザーPMCプレジデント

desc.en: 遊戲開發部四人回到了自己的社團活動室，發現愛麗絲正在做一個小機器人的模型。愛麗絲說這是Kei在消失前，她所看見的東西――也就象徵著Kei本身。
desc.jp: 遊戲開發部四人回到了自己的社團活動室，發現愛麗絲正在做一個小機器人的模型。愛麗絲說這是Kei在消失前，她所看見的東西――也就象徵著Kei本身。
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}四人回到了自己的社团活动室，发现{cf爱丽丝}正在做一个小机器人的模型。{cf爱丽丝}说这是Kei在消失前，她所看见的东西――也就象征着Kei本身。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.jp: 遊戲開發部眾人來到了特異現象搜查部的活動室，在那他們意外見到了季。季表示會長仍然處於失蹤狀態，因而現在正在求職。愛麗絲邀請季加入自己的隊伍，但被季謝絕，表示自己有任務在身。
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}众人来到了{cn特异现象搜查部}的活动室，在那他们意外见到了{cf季}。{cf季}表示会长仍然处于失踪状态，因而现在正在求职。{cf爱丽丝}邀请{cf季}加入自己的队伍，但被{cf季}谢绝，表示自己有任务在身。

desc.en: 陽葵前來詢問發生了什麼。眾人說在桃井的遊戲機上突然出現了一個以Kei的名字所命名的存檔。陽葵對這種情況先是一驚，但之後表示這一檔案的大小和結構都很奇怪，可能需要莉音的幫助才能解析。
desc.jp: 陽葵前來詢問發生了什麼。眾人說在桃井的遊戲機上突然出現了一個以Kei的名字所命名的存檔。陽葵對這種情況先是一驚，但之後表示這一檔案的大小和結構都很奇怪，可能需要莉音的幫助才能解析。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}前来询问发生了什么。众人说在{cf桃井}的游戏机上突然出现了一个以Kei的名字所命名的存档。{cf阳葵}对这种情况先是一惊，但之后表示这一文件的大小和结构都很奇怪，可能需要{cf莉音}的帮助才能解析。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 愛麗絲掏出了自己做的小機器人，跟陽葵說這是她照著Kei的樣子做出來的。她希望能將Kei給帶回來。雖然暫時無法解析檔案資料，但陽葵提議為模型增加儲存功能，將檔案存進去，順便當個鑰匙扣。愛麗絲欣然同意。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲掏出了自己做的小機器人，跟陽葵說這是她照著Kei的樣子做出來的。她希望能將Kei給帶回來。雖然暫時無法解析檔案資料，但陽葵提議為模型增加儲存功能，將檔案存進去，順便當個鑰匙扣。愛麗絲欣然同意。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}掏出了自己做的小机器人，跟{cf阳葵}说这是她照着Kei的样子做出来的。她希望能将Kei给带回来。虽然暂时无法解析文件数据，但{cf阳葵}提议为模型增加存储功能，将文件存进去，顺便当个钥匙扣。{cf爱丽丝}欣然同意。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.jp: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.zh_cn:
绝对存在自律分析系统「十字神名」究竟是什么？
为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.jp: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.zh_cn:
绝对存在自律分析系统「十字神名」究竟是什么？
为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en: Himari tries to interpret Decagrammaton's structure based on the collected data, but Decagrammaton appears and launches an attack. However, Decagrammaton suddenly panics and backs hastily away when faced with the Shittim Chest.
desc.jp: Himari tries to interpret Decagrammaton's structure based on the collected data, but Decagrammaton appears and launches an attack. However, Decagrammaton suddenly panics and backs hastily away when faced with the Shittim Chest.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}打算利用先前收集到的数据分析十字神名的构造，没想到十字神名却在此时现身攻击众人。{et希迪姆的箱子}的出现似乎另十字神名相当惊慌，而战斗也在十字神名的匆忙撤退下暂时落幕。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.jp: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.zh_cn:
绝对存在自律分析系统「十字神名」究竟是什么？
为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en: Eimi and Sensei successfully neutralize Kether and make their way to the Research District after the battle. While inspecting the site, Himari senses something is amiss and decides to take part in the field investigation.
desc.jp: Eimi and Sensei successfully neutralize Kether and make their way to the Research District after the battle. While inspecting the site, Himari senses something is amiss and decides to take part in the field investigation.
desc.zh_cn: 战斗结束后，{cf英美}和老师成功让「凯瑟」失效，并且潜入了「研究地区」。{cf阳葵}在观察现场后觉得很可疑，于是便参加了搜索现场的任务。

desc.en: Eimi and Sensei launch an investigation of the area where Decagrammaton's signal was captured. Contrary to Himari's prediction, it fails to yield any results. But after a moment of contemplation, Sensei notices the presence of a highly conspicuous vending machine and they are met with Decagrammaton's main form.
desc.jp: Eimi and Sensei launch an investigation of the area where Decagrammaton's signal was captured. Contrary to Himari's prediction, it fails to yield any results. But after a moment of contemplation, Sensei notices the presence of a highly conspicuous vending machine and they are met with Decagrammaton's main form.
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}和老师调查了捕捉到十字神名信号的地方。探索后没有获得任何成果，和{cf阳葵}预料中的完全不一样。但经过调查后，老师留意到了充满违和感的贩卖机，并从中发现了十字神名的本体。

desc.en: Himari is distraught to learn that Decagrammaton's main form is a lowly commercial AI. As the unsolved mystery leads only to more and more questions, the Super Phenomenon Task Force's mission at hand begins anew.
desc.jp: Himari is distraught to learn that Decagrammaton's main form is a lowly commercial AI. As the unsolved mystery leads only to more and more questions, the Super Phenomenon Task Force's mission at hand begins anew.
desc.zh_cn: 得知十字神名的本体是贩卖机AI后，{cf阳葵}感到相当茫然。在尚未解开的谜题中，疑问不断地堆栈，特异现象搜查部再次展开任务。

desc.en: 寧瑠與弦生率先對付赫賽德計程車兵。但十字神名的兵力沒有減少，就在危機感高漲之際，赤冬聯邦學園的援軍加入了。
desc.jp: 寧瑠與弦生率先對付赫賽德計程車兵。但十字神名的兵力沒有減少，就在危機感高漲之際，赤冬聯邦學園的援軍加入了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf宁瑠}与{cf弦生}率先对付赫赛德的士兵。但十字神名的兵力没有减少，就在危机感高涨之际，{sn赤冬}联邦学园的援军加入了。

desc.en: 桃香告知第2聖所已經被摧毀了。
desc.jp: 桃香告知第2聖所已經被摧毀了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃香}告知第2圣所已经被摧毁了。

desc.en: 英美宣佈交戰即將結束。不過敵人數量還是太多了，兩支隊伍有些疲於應付。
desc.jp: 英美宣佈交戰即將結束。不過敵人數量還是太多了，兩支隊伍有些疲於應付。
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}宣布交战即将结束。不过敌人数量还是太多了，两支队伍有些疲于应付。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 五個聖所全都消滅了，但能量全都集中在第6個聖所。在「最後聖所」進行決戰，現在命運全都取決於陽葵拿出的祕密武器。
desc.jp: 五個聖所全都消滅了，但能量全都集中在第6個聖所。在「最後聖所」進行決戰，現在命運全都取決於陽葵拿出的祕密武器。
desc.zh_cn: 五个圣所全都消灭了，但能量全都集中在第6个圣所。在「最后圣所」进行决战，现在命运全都取决于{cf阳葵}拿出的秘密武器。

desc.en: 確認順利消滅最後的聖所了。
desc.jp: 確認順利消滅最後的聖所了。
desc.zh_cn: 确认顺利消灭最后的圣所了。

desc.en: 陽葵和琳等人注意到各個聖所的能量正在共同朝一個方向聚集，生成了最後的聖所。
desc.jp: 陽葵和琳等人注意到各個聖所的能量正在共同朝一個方向聚集，生成了最後的聖所。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}和{cf琳}等人注意到各个圣所的能量正在共同朝一个方向聚集，生成了最后的圣所。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 陽葵突然說自己有祕密武器。英美有些不解。千尋解釋說，陽葵認為聖所的能量應該可以使一個東西在三分鐘內擴大化。就在陽葵物色該擴大什麼的時候，老師有了主意。
desc.jp: 陽葵突然說自己有祕密武器。英美有些不解。千尋解釋說，陽葵認為聖所的能量應該可以使一個東西在三分鐘內擴大化。就在陽葵物色該擴大什麼的時候，老師有了主意。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
